response.overview: The Call of the Entrepreneur tells the stories of three entrepreneurs: A failing dairy farmer in rural Evart, Michigan, a merchant banker in New York City and a refugee from Communist China Reverend Robert Sirico, author of The Entrepreneurial Vocation, joins Michael Novak, George Gilder and other experts in exploring how entrepreneurs shape our world.
response.tagline: Overcome adversity with innovation and creativity.
response.title: The Call of the Entrepreneur

results.name: The Call of The Entrepreneur Trailer
